choose.otherwise: `sessionId` AS `sessionId`, `login_name` AS `loginName`, `dept_name` AS `deptName`, `ipaddr` AS `ipaddr`, `login_location` AS `loginLocation`, `browser` AS `browser`, `os` AS `os`, `status` AS `status`, `start_timestamp` AS `startTimestamp`, `last_access_time` AS `lastAccessTime`, `expire_time` AS `expireTime`
